category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_aqa_date_range
preference.preference_description: Several tuning parameters used when auditing the querying of appearances and checking appearances based on the audit statistics. The statistics take the form of histograms along the lines of "N queries have been performed (on a given AppearanceRoot) for a date between D1 and D2 and/or a unit-no between U1 and U2". The width of each histogram block (D2-D1) and (U2-U1) is specified by TC_aqa_date_range and TC_aqa_unit_no_range.
